titleStmt.title: A declaration of His Highnesse the Lord Protector for a day of publick thanksgiving
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at White-hall this third day of July, 1658.
Initial letter; text in black letter.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
